description: Blend of pal (“close friend”) +‎ alimony (“maintenance”). Coined by celebrity divorce lawyer Marvin Mitchelson in 1977 in suit of his client Michelle Triola Marvin against the actor Lee Marvin.

entries.meaning: (law) A form of alimony paid to a former partner in a nonmarital relationship.
examples: Audball's latest pickup didn't seem to care where they were, or anything at all about alimony, palimony, or child support  […]
